attributes.action:
We want the buses keep running at night 
Thank you

P.s don't let them stop
attributes.background: The buses around stoke on Trent are no longer running at late night people need these for work etc .

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the local bus operator, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
